name: Geomancer
aura: Increases Ally HP in all battles by 25%

skills.name: Tremor Staff
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Has a 30% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ACC] debuff for 2 turns.

effects.notes: AoE. 30% chance to place Decrease ACC.

skills.notes: Useful for reducing enemy debuff application, especially in boss fights.

skills.name: Creeping Petrify
skills.description: Removes all buffs from a target enemy, then attacks them. Steals all buffs if the target is under a [HP Burn] debuff placed by this champion. Reduces the cooldown of Quicksand Grasp by 2 turns if the target is killed by this skill while under a [HP Burn] debuff placed by this Champion.

effects.notes: Single target. Removes/steals buffs, cooldown reduction if HP Burn.

skills.notes: Synergizes with his own HP Burn. Great for Hydra, Clan Boss, and bosses with buffs.

skills.name: Quicksand Grasp
skills.description: Fully depletes the target's Turn Meter. Fills this Champion's Turn Meter by the amount the target loses. Has a 75% chance of placing a [HP Burn] and a 25% [Weaken] debuff on the target for 3 turns.

effects.notes: Fully depletes target TM, steals it for self. 75%→100% chance (booked) to place HP Burn + 25% Weaken for 3 turns.
75% base chance (100% when booked) to place HP Burn for 3 turns. CRITICAL for passive synergy.
25% Weaken debuff for 3 turns. Increases damage taken by target by 25%.

skills.notes: Key skill for boss control and enabling his passive. MUST book to 100% HP Burn chance.

skills.name: Stoneguard
skills.description: Decreases the damage all allies receive by 15% and deflects that damage onto each enemy under a [HP Burn] debuff placed by this Champion. Whenever this Champion is attacked, deflects 30% of the damage instead. When deflecting damage, on each hit, has a 30% chance of dealing additional damage equal to 3% of the target’s MAX HP.

effects.notes: Conditional: 3% of enemy MAX HP if deflect triggers.

skills.notes: Unique mechanic, does not trigger Warmaster/Giant Slayer. Core to his boss damage.

recommended_gear: CLAN BOSS (UNM): Perception + Accuracy + Speed sets for 250+ ACC and 220+ SPD. HP% chest OR DEF% chest (survivability), DEF% gloves (survivability), SPD boots. Build for tankiness - passive scales with incoming damage. Lifesteal is NOT required (post-Patch 4.70 - passive no longer triggers Lifesteal). Stalwart set optional for damage reduction synergy with passive.

CLAN BOSS (Budget/Counterattack): Perception + Reflex sets for ACC and cooldown cycling. HP%/DEF% focus for survivability. Speed tune dependent (171-191 SPD for Budget Unkillable, 220+ for Counterattack). Master Hexer mastery extends HP Burn 2→3 turns (CRITICAL). A3 must be fully booked (100% HP Burn chance). Typical CB damage: 5-10M (UNM, naked HP Burn + reflect), 10-20M (with leech/heals for extended survival), 20-30M+ (with Vizier debuff extension).

HYDRA: Perception + Reflex + Accuracy sets for 450+ ACC (Hard Hydra). HP%/DEF% for survivability. Focus on keeping HP Burn up - passive reflects damage to ALL heads simultaneously. One of the best Epic Hydra champions (10-30M damage typical). Works in Brimstone Blessing comps (HP Burn synergy).

IRON TWINS FORTRESS: Perception + Accuracy sets for 450+ ACC (Stage 15). HP%/DEF% for tank role. Decrease ACC debuff from A1 reduces enemy debuff application. Passive deflects damage to BOTH twins when HP Burn active. Top-tier for Iron Twins (S-rank Epic). Fast clear times (4-5 minutes Stage 15 typical).

DOOM TOWER (Nether Spider, Scarab, Eternal Dragon, Dark Fae, Dreadhorn): Reflex + Perception sets for cooldown cycling and ACC. HP%/DEF% for survivability. Nether Spider: Intentionally trigger spiderling counterattacks with A1 AOE to deal passive reflect damage to mother spider (cheese strat). Scarab: Passive reflects damage even when Scarab has shield. Eternal Dragon: Top global leaderboard teams use Geomancer (10/10 rating). Dreadhorn: A1 Decrease ACC keeps boss ACC down. Dark Fae: Passive deals massive damage before she reaches 5 dark energy.

DUNGEONS (Dragon 25, Spider 25, Fire Knight 25, Ice Golem 25): Speed + Accuracy OR Perception + Reflex sets. Dragon/Spider: HP Burn + passive reflect for boss damage. Fire Knight: A3 TM depletion + passive reflect reduces shield count (5 ticks if full team + HP Burn). Ice Golem: Passive does NOT trigger golem's counterattack passive (safe for IG25). Decrease ACC from A1 reduces freeze/slow debuffs.

FACTION WARS (Dwarves): Perception + Reflex sets for ACC and cooldown cycling. HP%/DEF% for survivability. User has completed Dwarf Normal - Geomancer is top-tier for Hard progression (10/10 rating). HP Burn + Decrease ACC + TM control make him a carry.

NOTE: Lifesteal set NO LONGER WORKS post-Patch 4.70 (2021-10-05). Passive 'Stoneguard' reflected damage is classified as 'damage reflect' NOT 'damage hit' - does NOT trigger Warmaster/Giant Slayer/Lifesteal. Build for survivability (HP%/DEF%) and let healers/leech handle sustain. Stalwart set optional for damage reduction synergy (reduce incoming damage = more survivability while reflecting). Reflex set excellent for A3 spam (HP Burn uptime).

clan_boss: Offense: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Single Out, Bring it Down, Methodical, WARMASTER (A1/A2 single-hit - 60% proc, 4% boss MAX HP. NOTE: Passive reflected damage does NOT trigger Warmaster)

Support: Steadfast (+810 HP), Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Evil Eye (TM control), Lore of Steel, Master Hexer (CRITICAL - extends HP Burn/Dec ACC from A1/A3 for 2→3 turns), Cycle of Magic (cooldown cycling), Eagle Eye (CRITICAL +50 ACC for HP Burn consistency - 250+ ACC needed)
Defense: Tough Skin (CRITICAL - reduce incoming damage for passive reflection synergy), Blastproof, Resurgent, Shadow Heal, Delay Death, Unshakeable (+50 RES)
dungeons: Offense: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Single Out, Bring it Down, Methodical, WARMASTER (A1/A2 single-hit - 60% proc, 6% boss MAX HP. Passive reflected damage does NOT trigger Warmaster)

Support: Steadfast, Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Evil Eye (TM control), Lore of Steel, Master Hexer (CRITICAL - HP Burn/Dec ACC extension 2→3 turns), Cycle of Magic, Eagle Eye (CRITICAL +50 ACC - 250+ ACC total)
Defense: Tough Skin (reduce incoming damage for passive reflection), Blastproof, Resurgent, Shadow Heal, Delay Death, Unshakeable
arena: Offense: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Single Out, Bring it Down, Methodical, WARMASTER

Support: Steadfast, Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Evil Eye (TM control), Lore of Steel (Speed set boost), Master Hexer (HP Burn extension), Cycle of Magic, Eagle Eye (CRITICAL +50 ACC for 250+ total)
Defense: Tough Skin (reduce incoming damage), Blastproof, Resurgent, Shadow Heal, Delay Death, Unshakeable (+50 RES for tank builds)
doom_tower: Offense: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Single Out, Bring it Down, Methodical, WARMASTER

Support: Steadfast, Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Evil Eye (TM control), Lore of Steel, Master Hexer (CRITICAL - HP Burn/Dec ACC extension), Cycle of Magic, Timely Intervention (TM on ally low HP), Lasting Gifts (buff extension), Eagle Eye (CRITICAL +50 ACC - 250+ ACC for Hard)
Defense: Tough Skin (CRITICAL - reduce incoming damage for passive reflection synergy), Blastproof, Resurgent, Shadow Heal, Delay Death, Unshakeable (debuff RES)
faction_wars: Offense: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Single Out, Bring it Down, Methodical, WARMASTER
Support: Steadfast, Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Evil Eye (TM control), Lore of Steel, Master Hexer (HP Burn/Dec ACC extension), Cycle of Magic, Eagle Eye (+50 ACC for HP Burn consistency)
Defense: Tough Skin (reduce incoming damage), Blastproof, Resurgent, Shadow Heal, Delay Death
general: PRIORITY OFFENSE T6: WARMASTER (A1/A2 are single-hit attacks - 60% proc per skill for 4% boss MAX HP / 6% dungeon boss MAX HP damage). Giant Slayer is INCORRECT for Geomancer (no multi-hit skills). NOTE: Passive 'Stoneguard' reflected damage does NOT trigger Warmaster/Giant Slayer - T6 Offense mainly for A1/A2 damage contribution.

PRIORITY SUPPORT T6: Master Hexer (CRITICAL - extends HP Burn/Dec ACC debuffs from 2→3 turns for sustained damage), Eagle Eye (CRITICAL +50 ACC for HP Burn consistency - need 250+ ACC Clan Boss/Doom Tower).
PRIORITY DEFENSE T6: Tough Skin (CRITICAL - reduces incoming damage, synergizes with passive Stoneguard reflection - less incoming damage = more survivability while dealing reflected damage).

KEY MASTERIES: Warmaster (A1/A2 single-hit), Master Hexer (CRITICAL - HP Burn/Dec ACC extension 2→3 turns), Eagle Eye (ACC for HP Burn), Tough Skin (reduce incoming damage for passive reflection synergy), Cycle of Magic (cooldown cycling for A3 HP Burn spam).

SYNERGIES: Passive 'Stoneguard' places Increase DEF 60% + Strengthen 25% on self + HP Burn on all enemies for 2 turns. When ally hit, reflects portion of damage to all enemies (does NOT trigger Warmaster/Giant Slayer, does NOT benefit from some artifact sets - UNIQUE mechanic). A3 places HP Burn on all enemies (75% chance, 100% booked, 3-turn CD). A2 removes/steals buffs + cooldown reduction if target under HP Burn. Master Hexer extends HP Burn from 2→3 turns for 50% more damage. Build for 250+ ACC (with Eagle Eye), 220+ SPD, HP%/DEF% for survivability (passive reflection scales with incoming damage).

UNIQUE MECHANICS: Passive reflected damage is NOT a hit - does not trigger Warmaster/Giant Slayer, does not benefit from Savage/Cruel sets, does not count as damage dealt for artifact set effects. Main damage source is HP Burn (passive + A3) and reflected damage from passive. Geomancer functions as a tank/reflect specialist.
DWARVES FACTION WARS: Top-tier (10/10 rating). User has completed Dwarf Normal - excellent for Hard progression. HP Burn + reflected damage + tankiness make Geomancer a carry.

blessings: Phantom Touch (Clan Boss): Extends debuff duration by 1 turn on buff/debuff application (25% chance). Synergizes with HP Burn and Decrease ACC - extends 2→3 turns even without Master Hexer. BEST for CB UNM.
Cruelty (Dungeons/Hydra): +12% damage to debuffed enemies. Geomancer applies HP Burn + Weaken - always benefits. Good for general dungeon use.
Brimstone (Hydra/Doom Tower): +30% HP Burn damage. Geomancer is HP Burn specialist - excellent synergy. Alternative to Phantom Touch for Hydra-focused builds.
NOTE: Phantom Touch is BEST for Clan Boss (debuff extension). Brimstone is BEST for Hydra (HP Burn damage). Cruelty is general-purpose.

ai_quirks.ai_issue_description: Will sometimes use A3 on non-priority targets (e.g., spiderlings), and A2 on low-HP targets, which can be suboptimal in auto-play.

cheese_strategy.cheese_type: HP Burn + Passive Damage Reflection (Boss Cheese)
cheese_strategy.cheese_mechanic_info: Geomancer enables multiple cheese strategies by reflecting massive damage via his unique passive 'Stoneguard'. Unlike normal damage, Stoneguard's reflect damage is classified as 'damage reflect' (not a hit), which ignores many boss mechanics and artifact set limitations. This makes Geomancer a meta-defining Epic for boss content.

champions: Leech champion (Godseeker Aniri, Tomb Lord, etc.)
specific_comps_and_synergies.mechanics: Geomancer places HP Burn on CB with A3 (75%→100% booked). Passive deflects 30% of damage back to CB when Geomancer is hit. With Leech debuff on CB, team sustains via healing from damage dealt. Master Hexer mastery extends HP Burn from 2→3 turns (50% more uptime). Typical damage: 5-10M (naked), 10-20M (with leech/sustain), 20-30M+ (with Vizier extension).
specific_comps_and_synergies.notes: Post-Patch 4.70 (2021-10-05): Passive NO LONGER triggers Lifesteal/Warmaster/Giant Slayer. Must use external healing (Leech, healer). Build for survivability (HP%/DEF%) - passive scales with incoming damage. A3 must be fully booked (100% HP Burn chance). Master Hexer is CRITICAL (extends HP Burn 2→3 turns). Speed tune dependent (171-191 for Budget Unkillable, 220+ for Counterattack).

specific_comps_and_synergies.mechanics: Geomancer's passive reflects damage to ALL Hydra heads simultaneously when HP Burn is active. Each head hit triggers separate reflection instances. With 6 heads, a single AOE attack can trigger massive reflect damage. Brimstone Blessing (+30% HP Burn damage) stacks with HP Burn. Typical damage: 10-20M (Hard Hydra), 20-30M+ (with perfect RNG and Brimstone team).
specific_comps_and_synergies.notes: Geomancer is one of the best Epic Hydra champions. Focus on ACC (450+ for Hard), HP%/DEF% for survivability, and Reflex sets for A3 spam (HP Burn uptime). Pair with Vizier for debuff extension (HP Burn 3→5+ turns). Watch for Head of Torment (cleanses debuffs) - re-apply HP Burn after cleanse.

specific_comps_and_synergies.comp_name: Iron Twins Fortress (HP Burn + Double Boss Reflect)
specific_comps_and_synergies.mechanics: Geomancer places HP Burn on one twin, passive reflects damage to BOTH twins simultaneously. A1 Decrease ACC reduces twin debuff application (critical for survivability). Typical clear time: 4-5 minutes (Stage 15). Geomancer often top damage dealer (40-50% of team damage).
specific_comps_and_synergies.notes: Requires 450+ ACC for Stage 15. Build for HP%/DEF% (tankiness). A3 TM depletion helps control twins. One of the best Epic Iron Twins champions (S-rank). Fast and safe clears.

specific_comps_and_synergies.mechanics: Nether Spider has spiderlings that counterattack when hit with AOE. Geomancer's A1 is AOE - INTENTIONALLY trigger spiderling counterattacks to deal passive reflect damage to MOTHER SPIDER. Each counterattack hit on Geomancer reflects 30% damage back to mother spider (since HP Burn is on her). With 10 spiderlings counterattacking, massive burst damage to boss. Top DT Hard leaderboard teams use this strat.
specific_comps_and_synergies.notes: Requires shields to survive spiderling burst. Geomancer must have HP Burn on mother spider BEFORE using A1. This is a known cheese strat - 'bad' AOE becomes 'good' for burst damage. Can clear Nether Spider DT90 Hard in 25 turns or less.

specific_comps_and_synergies.mechanics: Scarab King has permanent shield and counterattacks. Geomancer's passive reflects damage EVEN WHEN SCARAB HAS SHIELD. HP Burn ticks through shield. A3 TM depletion prevents Scarab from taking turns (no shield refresh). One of the safest Scarab strategies.
specific_comps_and_synergies.notes: MUST HAVE for higher Hard DT Scarab floors. Geomancer + shield spam is the most accessible Scarab comp for F2P/budget players.

specific_comps_and_synergies.comp_name: Eternal Dragon, Dark Fae, Dreadhorn (Doom Tower Hard)
specific_comps_and_synergies.mechanics: All three bosses hit hard with AOE - perfect for Geomancer's passive reflection. Eternal Dragon: Top global leaderboard teams use Geomancer (10/10 rating). Dark Fae: Passive deals massive damage before she reaches 5 dark energy. Dreadhorn: A1 Decrease ACC keeps boss ACC down (reduces debuff application).
specific_comps_and_synergies.notes: Geomancer is meta for multiple DT Hard bosses. Build for survivability and ACC.

cheese_strategy.requirements: A3 fully booked (100% HP Burn chance), Master Hexer mastery (extends HP Burn 2→3 turns), 250+ ACC (UNM CB), 450+ ACC (Hard Hydra/Iron Twins), HP%/DEF% focus for survivability, Leech debuff OR external healer (passive no longer triggers Lifesteal post-Patch 4.70), Reflex sets for A3 spam (recommended), Brimstone Blessing for Hydra (optional)
cheese_strategy.strengths: One of the best Epic champions for boss content (Clan Boss, Hydra, Iron Twins, Doom Tower Hard bosses). Unique passive mechanic bypasses many boss abilities. Accessible (Epic rarity). Works in F2P/budget comps. Top-tier for multiple content types (10/10 CB, 10/10 Hydra, S-rank Iron Twins, 10/10 DT Hard).
cheese_strategy.weaknesses: Passive NO LONGER triggers Lifesteal/Warmaster/Giant Slayer post-Patch 4.70 (2021-10-05) - MUST use external healing. Requires booking (A3 must be 100% HP Burn chance). Requires Master Hexer mastery (debuff extension). Bad AI (uses A3 on spiderlings, uses A2 on low-HP targets instead of HP Burn targets). Useless in Arena (6/10 rating). Requires high ACC (250-450+ depending on content). Passive scales with incoming damage - needs to survive to deal damage (tankiness required).

mechanics_advisory: Geomancer's passive 'Stoneguard' is a UNIQUE mechanic in RAID Shadow Legends. Post-Patch 4.70 (2021-10-05), the reflected damage is classified as 'damage reflect' rather than a 'damage hit'. This means: (1) Reflected damage does NOT trigger Warmaster or Giant Slayer masteries, (2) Reflected damage does NOT trigger Lifesteal, Toxic, or Stun artifact sets, (3) Reflected damage does NOT count as 'damage dealt' for artifact set effects, (4) Reflected damage BYPASSES many boss passives and mechanics (e.g., Ice Golem's counterattack passive, Scarab King's shield). This makes Geomancer meta-defining for boss content but requires external healing (Leech debuff or healer champions). Build for survivability (HP%/DEF%) and ACC (250+ for UNM CB, 450+ for Hard Hydra/Iron Twins). A3 must be fully booked (100% HP Burn chance). Master Hexer mastery is CRITICAL (extends HP Burn from 2→3 turns = 50% more uptime). Warmaster is still recommended for T6 Offense (A1/A2 are single-hit skills - 60% proc chance for 4% boss MAX HP damage), but main damage comes from HP Burn + passive reflection. Geomancer is one of the best Epic champions in the game for PVE content (10/10 CB, 10/10 Hydra, S-rank Iron Twins, 10/10 Doom Tower Hard). Useless in Arena (6/10 rating). Bad AI (uses A3 on spiderlings, uses A2 on low-HP targets). For Clan Boss, typical damage: 5-10M (naked HP Burn + reflect), 10-20M (with Leech/heals), 20-30M+ (with Vizier extension). For Hydra, typical damage: 10-20M (Hard), 20-30M+ (with Brimstone Blessing team). For Iron Twins, typical clear time: 4-5 minutes (Stage 15). For Doom Tower Hard, Geomancer is meta for Nether Spider (cheese strat), Scarab King (MUST HAVE), Eternal Dragon (top leaderboard teams), Dark Fae, and Dreadhorn. User has completed Dwarf Faction Wars Normal - Geomancer is top-tier for Hard progression (10/10 rating).

validation_metadata.ocr_notes: Stats from Complete/ directory file (existing data), verified against Ayumilove. Base stats confirmed: HP 15,525, ATK 1,343, DEF 935, SPD 94, C.RATE 15, C.DMG 60, RES 30, ACC 0. Aura: +25% HP all battles. 100% confidence.

citations: Patch 4.70 Notes (2021-10-05): Stoneguard passive changed to 'damage reflect' classification (no longer triggers Warmaster/Giant Slayer/Lifesteal)
Community consensus: Top Epic for CB/Hydra/Iron Twins/Doom Tower Hard bosses (Ayumilove S-rank, HellHades S-rank, Reddit community S-tier)
author: GitHub Copilot (Batch 1 comprehensive population - 2025-10-26)
update_notes: 2025-10-26: Restructured from Complete/ directory file to match canonical Champion_Dictionary_Template.json. Moved from 'forms' array structure to flat base_stats. Expanded recommended_gear from gear name list to content-specific detailed string array (8 entries). Expanded blessings from name list to detailed recommendations (4 entries). Expanded cheese_strategy to comprehensive documentation (6 specific comps with mechanics, notes, requirements, strengths, weaknesses). Added extensive mechanics_advisory (Patch 4.70 changes, damage benchmarks, build priorities). Added validation_metadata (100% confidence). Added author field. Fixed aura placement (moved to root from forms array). Fixed A3 effects (was null, now 3 detailed effect objects). Changed draft from undefined to false. Template-compliant with all Pain Keeper/Skullcrusher/Frozen Banshee standards.
2024-07-07 (original Complete/ file): Initial comprehensive entry with masteries, skills, ratings. Patch 8.00 notes added.
